name: Marble Shoot - Super Casual
description:
*****No money needed! yeah! FREE GAME !*****

Marble Shoot - Super Casual is coming now, faster and smaller. It is more easy to play, but truly addictive.
Your goal is to clear all the marbles before they reach the end of the path, and meanwhile, achieve Marbles and Combos as many as possible to get the highest score.

Marble Shoot - Super Casual Features:
- Much levels, there is a huge challenge.
- New elimination of play.
- Free props, no purchased.
- Play anytime, anywhere, no network can play!
- The perfect gaming experience, fun index is very, very high!
- Easy and fun to play, challenge mastery!

How to play:
1.Tap screen where you want to shoot marbles.
2.match 3 or more same color marbles to make blast.
3.Swap the shooting marble by touching the marble emitter.
4.You can use props to make the game easy.

Download it Now!!
Enjoy this egyptian mythological journey!!!
